<!-- wp:etch/text {"metadata":{"name":"Text"},"content":"\u003c!-- wp:etch/raw-html {\u0022content\u0022:\u0022ndocument.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {n  const rows = document.querySelectorAll('.ui-typography-section-alpha__row:not([data-typography-sample])');n  n  rows.forEach(row =\u003e {n    const heading = row.querySelector('h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6');n    if (heading) {n      const styles = window.getComputedStyle(heading);n      n      const fontFamily = styles.getPropertyValue('font-family');n      const fontSize = styles.getPropertyValue('font-size');n      const fontWeight = styles.getPropertyValue('font-weight');n      const letterSpacing = styles.getPropertyValue('letter-spacing');n      n      const infoDiv = document.createElement('div');n      infoDiv.innerHTML = `n        ${fontFamily} / ${fontSize} / ${fontWeight} Weight / ${letterSpacing} Letter Spacingn      `;n      n      row.appendChild(infoDiv);n    }n  });n});\u0022,\u0022unsafe\u0022:\u0022true\u0022} --\u003e\n"} /-->
<!-- /wp:etch/element -->
<!-- /wp:etch/element -->
